plansAnnual.name: Standard Player (Free)
plansAnnual.description: For any player who is just getting started
features: Access global rankings with a personal account
Sign up for events and tournaments
Host one unranked event at a time

plansAnnual.name: Premium Supporter
plansAnnual.description:
For experienced players ready to host small events.
*Your support at this level helps to maintain the platform without ads
features: Host ranked and unranked events
Submit official ranked matches from your events
Stripe integration for paid events

plansAnnual.name: Community Administrator
plansAnnual.description:
For leaders ready to build a community and host tournaments.
*Your support at this level funds additional development and features
features: Create and manage your own club
Club leaderboard and rankings
Host ranked tournaments with post-event statistics
Players earn laurels for competing in your tournaments.
Unlock a 10% discount code for BrownCastle Games (5% club credit + 5% instant savings)
